title: OAuth2 no longer available
content: Since Thunderbird v. 140.1 installed, have been unable to send emails. Get pop-up instruction to check password. Using AOL, which requires OAuth2. But OAuth2 no longer appears in the Authentication Method drop-down menu.

title: Sometimes when I run a search on mail (Ctrl+Shift+F) the results window judders up and down making it difficult to read.  Any ideas as to wh?
content: Sometimes when I run a search in Tbird (Ctrl+Shift+F) the results window judders up and down. Any ideas why, or what is causing this? Running under Win 10; both win and TB updated for all patches. Thanks.

title: Errore di invio:
content: Errore di invio: Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: Invio disabilitato per la casella, modificare la password / Sending disabled for this mailbox, please change password. Verificare l’indirizzo email nelle impostazioni dell’account e riprovare.
creator: giuseppgioia

title: Authentication failed
content:
Hello,

I am having problems with one of my email accounts and I get this message: Authentication failed while connecting to the imap.gmail.com server I tried to remove the account and add it again checking carefully all the gmail details that are correct but when I try to activate I get message that something is wrong with nickname password or email address. I repeat everything is correct and I don't really understand why I can't connect thia account anymore. It was warking good for few years but saddenly yesterday It was not working anymore! Can you please assist?

Thank you in advance
creator: domenico4
